name: Love Alone Death
description:
Embark on a hand-drawn, story-driven, point-and-click game. Unravel the story, discover items, and get to know characters whose endings depend on your choices.
Humans have suddenly disappeared from the world, and those who remain are sticking together. You, who always struggled to be with others, now face the choice of whom to spend your final moments with.


Game Features:
- Various Ways to Solve Problems: Your choices affect character relationships.
- Multiple Endings: Choose one person to spend your final moments with, play the romance route, go for the all-inclusive ending, or even confront the end alone. Collect all endings and complete the challenges.


- Warning: Occasional disturbing elements such as corpses, mice, blood, vomit, and severed heads may appear without warning.
